# Hitherto

## Pronunciation

- /ˈhɪðəˌtuː/
- <details><summary>/ˈhɪðɚˌtu/</summary><audio controls><source src="https://api.dictionaryapi.dev/media/pronunciations/en/hitherto-us.mp3"></audio></details>

## Meanings

### Adverb

Up to this or that time.

heretofore, up to now




hitherto
